progTemplates.ProgrammaticTemplatePath.description: The absolute path to the programmatic template script. Only one script is supported at a time. If you want to use multiple, you can call them from your script and combine them in whatever way you want. TODO: add such an example

commands.title: Execute the script and relace selected text with the output
Execute the script and relace selected text with the output, passing 2 as value of commandNo in options object
Execute the script and relace selected text with the output, passing 3 as value of commandNo in options object
Execute the script and relace selected text with the output,passing 4 as value of commandNo in options object
Execute the script and relace selected text with the output, passing 5 as value of commandNo in options object
